title: #82: Where Brooklyn At (Dwayne Perkins, Ari Shaffir, Old Neighbor Lady)
itunes:title: Where Brooklyn At with Dwayne Perkins, Old Neighbor Lady and Ari Shaffir
description: Dwayne Perkins had me over to his apartment to talk about Brooklyn. He broke down all the different parts of the area, where the crime is, where the cockroaches are, and where the Jews avoid. Nothing serious here, just a lot of fun.
